name: Mrs. Mayfield's Tales
description:
Memories are treasures.  Slices of our life, of our past, preserved in our minds until they fade away.

In this visual novel you play the role of an old lady, Mrs. Mayfield, whose memory is not what it used to be. Be sure to tell a lot of stories to your nurse, Grace, while you can!

Can you find the right path to keep Mrs. Mayfield's mind as sharp as possible? Or will you let her precious memories slip away?

Which of the 4 available endings will you find?

And what secret is hidden behind all those tales?

Made for the Pizza Jam june 2018, theme "memory"
